aatha pa්radeshayaka ho ethera rataka sthira wasayakata awasthawa salase.
uthure thama anagatha paramparawa wenuwen ema bhumiya aaraksha kala yuthu bawath eya kala hakke wenama rajyayak bihikara ganimen pamanak bawath hethema kiya.
ema pil maru nisa aanduwe pa්racharaka yantha්ranaya binda watena thaththwayak athiwi emagin janadhipathiwarayage desha palana shakthiya balawath khadanayakata lakwanu athi bawath danagannata thibe.
rate madhya nidahasata thama palana kalaye di kisindu balapamak ella nowana bawata sthira washayenma sahathika wana bawa janadhipathi gotabhaya rajapaksha mathithuma pawasayi.
ek pahanakin andura tharamak durata samanaya kala haki wuwath rataka mudahala ghanaandhakaraya nasima eka pahanakin kala haki karyayak nowe.
apa sahakaruwaku ho sahakariyaka sewimedi apa paurushaye sa`gawi athi mema lakshana ha manawa sasandena pudgalaya sewimata uthsaha ganna bawa yung pawasayi.
meyata amatharawa purwagami islamiya widwathun wu ibn thayimiyya ha ibn al kayyim wani shreshtayinge grantha da hadara itha pulul danumak laba ganimata katayuthu karana ladi.
lankawe thawa ki denekta oya lede hadeyida danna...
namuth ada chinaya diyunu wanne kesedayi oba asanu athi ,pilithura saralayi chinaya kriyawen samajawadi nowana athara dadi nithi magin thama janaya palanaya kirima owunge mulika lakshanayayi.
